name: launch-notification-broadcaster
description: Use this to parse Audit Events by Adobe Launch and send them to your own locations.

scripts.install: npm run zip &&  wsk action create {companyName}-launch-notifications --kind nodejs:12 ./{companyName}-launch-notifications.zip --web true
scripts.add-apis: npm run add-post-api && npm run add-get-api
scripts.update: del {companyName}-launch-notifications.zip | npm run zip && wsk action update {companyName}-launch-notifications --kind nodejs:12 ./{companyName}-launch-notifications.zip --web true
scripts.delete: wsk action delete {companyName}-launch-notifications && wsk api delete /notifications
